channel.title: Can't equip diamond bolts or other bolts?
channel.description: I can't equip diamond bolts (e) and all the other (e) bolts besides the dragon bolts (e), i made all the speces work on players and both npcs, but like diamonds bolts (e) i can't even wield with any bow or without any bow or cbow! and I want to fix it so how would I do that, would that be in result of the client, or my source, I think source because the client has the "wield" option but i click and click and it stays there! someone please explain why is this and if you know how please tell me, thank you.

we need an image that aint a fail.
